modelIdentification.name: SISO-STD-001.1-2015 - Real-time Platform Reference Aggregate FOM Module
modelIdentification.purpose: The RPR FOM supports interoperability for real-time, platform oriented defense simulation.
modelIdentification.description: This module provides the object class definition for representing aggregates of entities.

reference.identification: Real-time Platform Reference Base FOM Module
Standard for Guidance, Rationale, and Interoperability Modalities for the Real-time Platform Reference Federation Object Model (RPR FOM) SISO-STD-001-2015 10 August 2015
IEEE Standard for Distributed Interactive Simulation - Application Protocols IEEE Std 1278.1-1995 September 21, 1995
IEEE Standard for Distributed Interactive Simulation - Application Protocols IEEE Std 1278.1a-1998 19 March 1998

objectClass.name: AggregateEntity
objectClass.semantics: A group of one or more separate objects that operate together as part of an organization. These objects may be discrete, may be other aggregate objects, or may be a mixture of both.

attribute.name: AggregateMarking
attribute.semantics: A unique marking or combination of characters used to distinguish the aggregate from other aggregates.

attribute.name: AggregateState
attribute.semantics: An indicator of the extent of association of objects form an operating group.

attribute.name: Dimensions
attribute.semantics: The size of the area covered by the units in the aggregate.

attribute.name: EntityIdentifiers
attribute.semantics: The identification of entities that are contained within the aggregate.

attribute.name: ForceIdentifier
attribute.semantics: The identification of the force that the aggregate belongs to.

attribute.name: Formation
attribute.semantics: The category of positional arrangement of the entities within the aggregate.

attribute.name: NumberOfSilentEntities
attribute.semantics: The number of elements in the SilentEntities list.

attribute.name: NumberOfVariableDatums
attribute.semantics: The number of records in the VariableDatums structure.

attribute.name: SilentAggregates
attribute.semantics: The numbers and types, of silent aggregates contained in the aggregate. Silent aggregates are sub-aggregates that are in the aggregate, but that are not separately represented in the virtual world.

attribute.name: SilentEntities
attribute.semantics: The numbers and types, of silent entities in the aggregate. Silent entities are entities that are in the aggregate, but that are not separately represented in the virtual world.

attribute.name: SubAggregateIdentifiers
attribute.semantics: The identifications of aggregates represented in the virtual world that are contained in the aggregate.

attribute.name: VariableDatums
attribute.semantics: Extra data that describes the aggregate.

arrayData.name: MarkingArray31
arrayData.semantics: String of characters represented by a 31 element character string.

arrayData.name: SilentAggregateStructLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Set of silent aggregates (aggregates not registered in the federation).

arrayData.name: SilentEntityStructLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: A set of silent entities (entities not registered in the federation).

arrayData.name: VariableDatumStructLengthlessArray
arrayData.semantics: Set of additional data associated with an aggregate.

fixedRecordData.name: AggregateMarkingStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Unique marking associated with an aggregate.

fixedRecordData.name: SilentAggregateStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: These fields contain information about subaggregates not registered in the federation.

field.name: AggregateType
field.semantics: This field shall specify the aggregates common to this system list.

field.name: NumberOfAggregatesOfThisType
field.semantics: This field shall specify the number of aggregates that have the type specified in AggregateType field.

fixedRecordData.name: SilentEntityStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: These fields contain information about entities not registered in the federation.

field.name: NumberOfEntitiesOfThisType
field.semantics: This field shall specify the number of entities that have the type specified in the field EntityType.

field.name: NumberOfAppearanceRecords
field.semantics: This field shall specify the number of Entity Appearance records that follow. This number shall be between zero and the number of entities of this type. Simulation applications representing the aggregate that do not model entity appearances shall set this field to zero. Simulation applications representing the aggregate that model entity appearances shall set this field to the number of entity appearances that deviate from the default appearance. Other simulations can safely assume that any entity appearances not specified are default appearances.

field.name: EntityType
field.semantics: This field shall specify the entity types common to the entities in this system list.

field.name: EntityAppearance
field.semantics: This field shall specify the entity appearances of entities in the aggregate that deviate from the default. The length of the array is defined in the NumberOfAppearanceRecords field.

note.label: RPRnoteAggregate5
note.semantics: The units and semantics for the MarkingData array elements are specified by the value of the MarkingEncodingType.

note.label: RPRnoteAggregate6
note.semantics: The interpretation of the 32 bits defining the entity appearance is to be derived from the federation agreements, which could refer to the entity appearance record as defined in SISO-REF-010. The reason that this has not been split out into separate fields (as has been done for the subclasses of BaseEntity) is the difficulty of providing an efficient manner of defining an array of such appearance fields.
